title: Crash after log in
body:
My little brother wants to play league so I made an account for him with a brand new email and all but everytime he goes to log in, the log in will be successful but the client immediately crashes. 
After trying to log in to his account a few rimes with a crash everytime, I tried logging into MY account...which worked perfectly fine soooo I have no idea whats up there, anyone else?
